name: Moriya's Wanton Winter Wager
description:
(Freeze frame of a yamabiko suspended upside down in the sky, a few feet off the ground that's covered in snow, a snowboard attached to her feet.)

Yep, that’s me. You’re probably wondering how I ended up in this situation. - Kyouko Kasodani, probably. If she were a terrible storyteller.

But she's not a terrible storyteller. She's just a terrible snowboarder.

The worst there ever is.

At least, that's what her rival Mystia told me. What, I shouldn't just take a random baby-looking night sparrow's word for granted? Give me a better citation, then.

You will find it.

On the premises of Moriya's Wanton Winter Wager.

Powered by KRINGE.
